Strings.Text: On the dead body, there are bite \nmarks everywhere. It must have {pause}{clear}been attacked by a whole army \nof them.{pause}
This used to be the open area of \nthe main entrance of the facility. {pause}{clear}But now it is being swallowed \nby the jungle vegetation.{pause}
The electronic lock is activated. \nTo unlock it you need the {pause}{clear}Research Facility Key Card.{pause}
The electronic lock has already \nbeen deactivated.{pause}
